quizzes.name: Gentle Beginnings
items: I enjoy learning small new things about my partner every day.
We find simple ways to have fun together.
I feel comfortable being myself around my partner.
We laugh together without effort.
Being with my partner feels natural and relaxed.

quizzes.name: Warm Vibes
items: My partner helps create a warm atmosphere in our daily life.
I often feel uplifted when we spend time together.
We greet each other in a pleasant, affectionate way.
Being around my partner usually puts me in a good mood.
We share positive emotions regularly.

quizzes.name: Simple Joys
items: We appreciate small joyful moments together.
Simple activities feel meaningful with my partner.
We have small routines that bring us joy.
I feel happy sharing everyday experiences with my partner.
Small joys help strengthen our bond.

quizzes.name: Getting Comfortable
items: I feel at ease expressing basic preferences.
We can relax in silence together.
We're good at making each other comfortable.
We navigate small decisions without difficulty.
I feel accepted as I am.

quizzes.name: Playful Moments
items: We enjoy light teasing or playful banter.
Our relationship includes fun moments every week.
We bring humor into everyday situations.
We make each other smile without trying.
Playfulness helps us stay close.

quizzes.name: Feel-Good Foundations
items: Our relationship feels grounded in positivity.
I feel good about the way we interact.
There's a sense of ease between us.
We create a pleasant environment together.
I feel emotionally steady when we spend time together.
